cons: It is best to avoid acidic foods like tomatoes to avoid acid reflux symptoms.
People with severe kidney issues must also limit the intake of tomatoes as they contain a lot of water
description: Tomatoes are one of the low-calorie vegetables.They are also very low in fat contents and have zero cholesterol levels.

The antioxidants present in tomatoes are scientifically found to be protective against cancers, including colon, prostate, breast, endometrial, lung, and pancreatic tumorsthey are also a good source of antioxidant vitamin-C.
Vitamin-C helps the body develop resistance against infectious agents and scavenge harmful free radicals.Fresh tomato is very rich in potassium.
Potassium is an important component of cell and body fluids that helps controlling heart rate and blood pressure caused by sodium.
name: Tomato
pros: The fiber, potassium, vitamin C, and choline content in tomatoes all support heart health. Tomatoes are a rich source of lycopene, lutein, and beta-carotene.
